greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * (A020639 * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n.
comment: Row sums = a signed version of A097945: (1, -1, -2, 0, -4, 2, -6,...) such that parity = (+) iff mu(n) = +.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * (A020639 * 0^(n-k)), 1<=k<=n; where A020639 = Lpf(n): (1, 2, 3, 2, 5, 2, 7, 2, 3, 2,...) and A054525 = the Mobius transform.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
results.author: Gary W. Adamson & _Mats Granvik_, Jul 27 2008
